docs.lead_paragraph: Someday they will write of these past 20 years of the 20th-century, and they will not dwell on Vietnam, Richard Nixon, the Woodstock generation or, if cool heads prevail, the Middle East crises.
docs.abstract: Article discusses some commercial benefits derived from space program; holds most fundamental revolution is our perception of ourselves in the universe; illus (L)
docs.snippet: Someday they will write of these past 20 years of the 20th-century, and they will not dwell on Vietnam, Richard Nixon, the Woodstock generation or, if cool heads prevail, the Middle East crises.
